name: The Book of Circles
text:
THE BOOK OF CIRCLES



[This treatise on swordsmanship, supposedly penned by Frandar Hunding himself, is considered a holy text by the Redguards. Traditionalist households often have an alcove near the hearth just big enough to hold a copy of the book, and readings are a part of daily life in Hammerfell. It lists the thirty-eight grips, seven hundred and fifty offensive and eighteen hundred defensive positions, and nearly nine thousand moves which the Redguards consider essential to sword mastery.]
